title: [RFC] Compound
body:
In partnership with [Compound Grants](https://compoundgrants.org/72a37fa77b2b4423a97602d6a70fb5f5), Our Network is putting out a **Request for Coverage (RFC)** on [Compound](https://compound.finance/). 

Interested contestants should submit a public dashboard (we recommend [Dune Analytics](https://duneanalytics.com/) or [Flipside Crypto](https://flipsidecrypto.com/)) with 6+ data points on Compound's network health using this [this submission form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfVf22RXYHiUpDfa3eJx5f9w0oLXWeDAaMCdQqGnOmwU2fsaA/viewform?usp=sf_link). Winning submissions will also be featured in a future [Our Network](http://www.ournetwork.xyz) newsletter.

To get started, see below for some ideas:
* Comparing Compound's daily revenue to COMP issuance 
* Charting reserves for each market over time (e.g., chart showing reserve growth on USDC day by day) 
* Charting % of total borrow for each asset over time (e.g., USDC, 41%, DAI, 40%, USDT 8%, etc.) 
* Utilization rate per asset over time  
* List of largest suppliers and borrowers 
* List of accounts close to being liquidated  
* List of accounts that performed liquidations, listed by dollar amount (notional) 

**ðŸ“… Due Date** 
- Friday, April 2nd

**ðŸ’° Bounty**
- $5k worth of COMP each for the top 3 dashboards
- $250 worth of COMP to all other applicants 

**âœ¨ Judge**
- Larry Sukernik (Compound Grants)
